name: Moe
description: Moe is a deflationary memecoin launched on the Ethereum platform. This cryptocurrency revolves around the red face emoticon meme. Much like its yellow counterpart, known as "yellow boi," the red boi aims to share humorous memes within the community. The project aims to capitalize on the popularity of meme coins, like Dogecoin and PEPE, and strives to establish itself as one of the top meme-based cryptocurrencies. Moe appeals to the cryptocurrency community by instituting a no-tax policy, a redistributive system rewarding long-term stakers, and a burning mechanism to maintain scarcity of the Moe coin.
